text: @BBCNews @bbclaurak Governed by a bunch of fucking fools. So many countries have a decent coronavirus tracing app. How about just rebranding one of them as the UKs app? Put a fucking Union Jack all over it at great expense if it makes you feel better. Shocking incompetence. FFS.
